content: this square is worked in tunisian mosaic crochet 25 stitches x 25 repeats it is also suitable for mosaic overlay crochet i enjoyed creating these patterns to complete a baby blanket the pdf file include only the chart with xs written pattern is not included explanations regarding tunisian crochet or mosaic not included you can use the squares to make a blanket pot holders placemats or whatever your imagination suggests my blanket is made with stylecraft double knit yarn with a 6mm crochet hook but you can use cotton yarn with the hook suitable for that type of yarn two colors are used one for the background and one for the design and they are exchanged at each round if you don t know the tunisian mosaic crochet technique you can search on youtube where you will find many valid videos have fun
